meanings.definition: The quality of possessing intelligence that surpasses human capabilities.
meanings.sent1: Her superintelligence allowed her to solve complex problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist believed that creating superintelligence could have unforeseen consequences.
meanings.sent3: The robot's superintelligence made it the star of the science fair.
meanings.sent4: His superintelligence was like a beacon of light in the darkness of ignorance.
meanings.sent5: The concept of superintelligence fascinated the young students.

meanings.definition: An entity or being with intelligence far superior to that of humans.
meanings.sent1: The alien was rumored to possess superintelligence beyond human comprehension.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's superintelligence helped them outsmart the villain.
meanings.sent3: The cat's superintelligence was evident when it opened the door by itself.
meanings.sent4: The superintelligence of the AI program was unmatched in the industry.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the robot's superintelligence left the audience in awe.
